nodes.bodyText: Stupid question ... but ... On line 692 you create topic original-topic and here you just list it and check it has the right name? Because how do you know this is not the initial topic you created when using single namespace? I guess you could say that if on line 725 you can read the mirrored messages from the topic original-topic it worked. But this should be either fixed or removed.
Yes, that's true, I'm looking at solution that getting (somehow, if it is possible) the KafkaTopics from MM2 API ...
But 😄 don't know if it is possible

Nothing easy comes to my mind. I don't even know how the TO would handle it. So I guess you can:

decide that reading the messages from the topic is good enough (assuming the internal client doesn't subscribe to some regex)
Check it using Kafka APIs / kafka_topics.sh
I was thinking about it, I will check it via Kafka APIs/kafka_topics.sh -> I want to be 100% sure of this 😄
Now it should be more sufficient
